lenders.name: Sarah

I really like being able to see how money that would normally just sit in my bank account can really bless someone else, and make a huge difference in their life. It has really made me see how much I take money for granted, and how many people all over the world have to work so hard to have a fraction of the comforts that I have with such ease

lenders.name: Douglas Arthur
lenders.loan_because: I need a loan to expand on my business , currently i can hardly makes ends meet with all the expenses involved, If your organization helps me i will be able to pay this back within 24 months
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a  {iBT} Internet Based Test  center administrator .I got involved in this business one year ago, i have been self employed for over five years now, I invested heavily in helping set up two three online tests , that help Students seek admissions in universities abroad.
I am single not married but want to get settled soon as the years are advancing. I want to set up a new online test site in my home town Kisumu, there is non currently i want to be the 1st.I want to make this in in the history books to help the disadvantaged bright kids get quality education abroad./this as a way to help bridge the poverty gap.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: I've always been lucky enough to have family help me in the past and now I'm finally able to help others who aren't as lucky as I was. lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because:
Two reasons: I study Economics, in which microloans have shown to be great ways to aid entrepreneurs in developing countries.

And 

I spent a month in Peru last year and loved every minute, and want to give back.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because:
There was a woman named Juanita who helped us with laundry everyday in Lima.  Barely 20, she had two kids and lived in a makeshift house with a tin roof just down the street.  Just like her, Lima has millions of people who came from the countryside in search of a better life in Lima.  Kids juggle at intersections, women sell candy, men shine shoes and wash cars.  Each one of them is an informal entrepreneur, trying to make it in the big city and carve out a place for themselves in the world.  

I loan because they work harder than anyone I know, and a little investment can make a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Make cool stuff online.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: I had been reading about Kiva and doing some research when that same day my daughter gave me a gift certificate to Kiva as my mothers day present.  I was thrilled!!  Some of my family have already talked about doing this for Christmas.  I hope this gift helps someone achieve their dreams and goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an optometric assistant and volunteer with an organization that provides service dogs for children with autism.

lenders.loan_because: I believe in offering the same opportunities given to me to others throughout the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy and sell college textbooks throughout California and make them available to students at greatly discounted prices.

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because:
I think that one of the best ways to help people in the long term, is to empower them to help themselves. This is a wonderful opportunity to put one's money to work over and over again as it is loaned to one entrepreneur, repaid and loaned out again to another entrepreneur.

Instead of going out for a meal, one can take the money and loan it to a Developing World entrepreneur who in turn can finance the establishment/expansion of his/her business so he/she can provide shelter, food, clothing and education for his/her dependents and create for herself/himself a happier life and a brighter future.

The loans aren't just helping out the entrepreneur, but also the people/enterprises from who he/she makes purchases to start/expand/operate his/her business.

Look at the economic impact that a business/company has on a community/town/city in your own country and imagine the impact that a few successful entrepreneurial endeavours might have on their communities. It creates a healthy community spirit/environment for these communities to really flourish economically, socially, etc.

lenders.name: david
lenders.loan_because:
Finally!! A non-profit with the right idea. 
 I find that most charities out there are inefficient. They keep giving money and food away year after year and it seems to be a never ending cycle.
 Kiva's model is the best way to economic progress. Helping someone with their business by "lending" money promotes self-sufficiency and pride, and will also build the local economy.

lenders.loan_because: its a small step that makes a difference.

I can.

I think that by loaning through Kiva, I'm helping change someone's life. Someone will be able to plant their crops or start a business or help their children because they've gotten help when they needed it. I'm glad I can be a part of that.

Also, I am a recent convert to veganism and would like to support a more peaceful and respectful way of life through my loans.

lenders.loan_because: it's great to be able to choose where the money goes and reinvest it back into new projects. Kiva is a true hand up, not hand out.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: one way for a person without a lot of money to help those with even less money--reciprocal financial partnerships perpetuate a cycle of shared abundance
lenders.occupational_info: English professor--concentration and deep interest in reading and writing

lenders.name: JEANINE
lenders.occupational_info: I CLEAN HOMES N ALSO IM A ORGANIZER

lenders.name: annette
lenders.loan_because: Helping people help themselves to a stable life is better than the alternative we see in this world - ideological and greed driven war and intolerance
lenders.occupational_info: I help people become literate so we have a less ignorant world

lenders.name: Julie,Leigh,Lizzie,Lucas
lenders.loan_because: This is a rewarding and intensely personal way to help others in need. I hope we can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Julie is an engineer and technical writer and Leigh is a computer systems analyst. We have two young children in primary school.

lenders.name: Peggy
lenders.loan_because: I lend because so many people in the world have a tougher life than I do. I like feeling part of something larger than myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I am lucky to be able to assist people in buying and selling their homes. Each day I meet the most wonderful people and help their dreams come true.

lenders.name: Phaivanh
lenders.loan_because: I hope that I will be able to contribute to a positive change in someone's live.
lenders.occupational_info: I just graduated from Monterey Institute of International Studies. Previously I worked for CARE International in Lao PDR and was inspired by its work.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: It shouldn't take much to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I create training courses that help people to improve at their jobs. I am also a professional musician.

lenders.name: Arisa ( L. V. ) Enomoto
lenders.loan_because: I just wanted to help....

lenders.name: Sascha the Terrible
lenders.loan_because: a cruel, cruel German forced me to do this.

lenders.name: Rhonda & Gary
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Karli
lenders.loan_because: I love helping people, and this is a really good thing to do with my money.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying Political Science and Environmental Studies at Boston College with the hopes of becoming an lawyer in the field of environmental law.

lenders.name: Shelley
lenders.loan_because: If a small amount can make such a big change in someone else's life, then it is a thing of beauty!
lenders.occupational_info: Registered Nurse

lenders.name: Jan and Dave
lenders.loan_because: We are able to do so, and it's a way to make a difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: Logistical field researcher

lenders.name: Mary Lynn
lenders.loan_because: My Grandma was an amazing women and a skilled tailor who always helped those in need.   I loan money to fellow women tailors in my Grandma’s memory.  I feel her amazing spirit lives on through them- she would be proud.
lenders.occupational_info: My research focus is to discover new drugs for infectious diseases.   I am also passionate about bringing new technology to developing countries

lenders.name: kevin
lenders.loan_because: I don't want to just do relief work. I want to work in prevention.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a Fair Trade organization, and for a movie that focuses on human trafficking

lenders.name: Jon Andre & Crystal
lenders.occupation: Offshore crane operator/ Acct. manager & marketing
lenders.loan_because: We love to get involved and help others in need.  It's great to see how a little can go a long way in changing the lives of others.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference, and put my money to its proper use building value in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as part of a team to carry out field trials of genetically modified corn and soybeans to find beneficial traits, while documenting plant characteristics for regulatory purposes.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and I understand how much work it takes to get the necessary funding.  I also fund because I want to help make dreams come true and I want to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a entrepreneur.

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.loan_because: "If we have no peace, it is because we have forgotten that we belong to each other." - Mother Teresa

lenders.name: Ryder
lenders.loan_because: it reminds me of how little I have to worry about when I think of how far my money will go when used by people in developing nations.
lenders.occupational_info: Student

lenders.name: Hugh
lenders.loan_because: to help someone else help themselves to a better life
lenders.occupational_info: I arrange finance for businesss to purchase plant & equipment, motor vehicles, trucks etc

lenders.name: Elissa
lenders.loan_because: of the possibility that such a small amount of giving can actually help someone to make a difference in their life and their children's life.

lenders.name: Patrice
lenders.loan_because: These entrepreneurs, who would never be considered by corporate lenders, are worthy of receiving loans and deserve the opportunity to better their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a wife and a mother raising two teenage daughters. I am a volunteer with the Benevolent Society's Home Visit program, visiting a young family once a week. I also work from home providing office support for my husband.

lenders.name: nathalie
lenders.loan_because: I believe I am responsible to my fellow men and women who are less fortunate living in underprivileged countries where they may have none or little support from their government.
lenders.occupational_info: I organize parties, weddings, dinners for wealthy people who are too busy to do all the work involved in the invitations, decorations, music, entertainment plus organizing food and drinks.

lenders.name: SCOTT & JULIE
lenders.loan_because: We love the idea of a hand up,  We feel we are really helping and that feels great.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: It's not much for me but it can mean a great deal to others, and I can recycle the loan over and over again, thus helping many!!
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a health service for people with acute mental health problems on the Central Coast, New South Wales, Australia.

lenders.name: Arvind
lenders.loan_because: I like helping others help themselves.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: Such a small amount of money can give someone the "step up" they need to be independent and have a better life.

lenders.name: marilyn
lenders.loan_because: i believe in all people.

lenders.name: Jo-Anne
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Kerrie
lenders.loan_because: I feel its a great way to help someone else who is trying their best to help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: Coach ¦ Equalist ¦ Happy

lenders.name: Saurabh
lenders.loan_because: I want to help where I can
lenders.occupational_info: I keep the machines running that make and bottle Pepsi and Aquafina

lenders.name: Maura
lenders.loan_because: to give a chance

lenders.name: Bryen & Michelle
lenders.loan_because: We believe that everyone should be given a chance to improve their lives & that of their families.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: It makes a difference.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because:
I'm sick of watching members of the so-called "first world" frittering away their money on rubbish. Kiva gives me the opportunity to give some direct help, to do something real. I hope to see the money again, but if I don't then at least I've helped someone, that's all that matters. When the funds come back, they will then go to help someone else.

I won't be withdrawing any funds, I'll just wait for some repayments before I reinvest. The funds I have invested will ALWAYS stay with Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I do my best to fix broken things.

lenders.name: Woody
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a great way to help people and change lives. Too many in the world only see America as its evil, busybody government, not the love filled hearts of typical Americans. Kiva helps change that. We loan money via people borrowing to expand farms and dairys because we are VERY concerned about food shortages with world population growing 75 million a year.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a wall street financial money manager in mutual funds. Holly is retired. We live in Maryland & Wyoming. We have 1 adult son lives near Hershey Pa.

lenders.name: Thaimaaopas.fi
lenders.loan_because: Tourists traveling in Thailand can contribute to well-being of less developed nations. Matkailijat voivat auttaa tätä kautta yritystoimintaa köyhemmissä maissa.
lenders.occupational_info: Thailand travel guide. Thaimaa matkaopas.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: People who work hard deserve to improve their way of life.
lenders.occupational_info: My job is to assist people who wish to sell their home or to buy a home to ensure their legal rights are protected. Also to help people who are involved in car crashes by making sure the person at fault pays for car repairs to the person who is innocent. Fishing, for food and gifts.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a receptionist at veterinary clinic. I am married and have a daughter.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: Its heartwarming and gratifying to see, hear and to believe that so many people are striving towards a common goal. One small match can warm  a thousand hearts, but a box can enlighten a globe.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: "God is in the sharing." -Neem Karoli Baba

lenders.name: Buster
lenders.loan_because: 1 John 3:17
lenders.occupational_info: Engaged in economic development and spiritual development

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because:
If I do something to help someone, then hopefully they in turn will do something to help someone else ... you know  "pay it forward".

I love the idea of everyday strangers helping each other out with the common goal of making this world a little better.
lenders.occupational_info:
I manage an office for a computer visualization company.  I take care of the accounting, managing the workforce, and every day office duties. 

I am also a very outgoing and social person who loves to be surrounded by fun, family and friends!

lenders.name: Fr. Bob
lenders.occupational_info: DREAM is a holistic program aimed at preventing the transition of the HIV/AIDS virus from a pregnant woman to her child.  It is 98% effective; that is, almost all the children are born HIV-free.

lenders.name: Dean
lenders.loan_because:
Its a way to help others, and when it comes down to it,
Because I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Field Services Officer

lenders.name: Kristy
lenders.occupational_info: As a REALTOR, I assist with the selling and buying of real estate.

lenders.name: Livia
lenders.occupational_info: I help people access information

lenders.name: Gina
lenders.loan_because: People have reached out to me in times of need -- I believe the only way to repay those who help you is to help others in need.

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.occupation: stay at home mom; former teacher
lenders.loan_because: I am drawn to the stories of people who are working hard to do the best for themselves and their families.  How could you not lend a hand when the opportunity presents itself?  Lending is a vote for hope and positive change.
lenders.occupational_info: Prior to having children, I was a middle school Spanish teacher and then an elementary gifted & talented educator.  I now stay home with my 2 small children and continue in a volunteer position as a Gifted Children's Advocate.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Jody
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate to have a decent job and not the daily struggles of so much of the world.  I believe everyone should be given a chance and I appreciate how hard so many people in the world work each day just to put food on the table.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to bring new medicines to market.

lenders.name: Justin
lenders.occupational_info: Build websites and other software for a clothing company.

lenders.name: Tahir Qureshi
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people obtain a better quality of life.

lenders.name: Tony
lenders.occupation: Real Estate Broker/Owner - Tony Kisivo Realty LLC
lenders.loan_because: We all can make the world better by helping each other. Everyone deserves a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a real estate Broker in the state of Kansas. I help people that want to sell their homes market them and find the right buyer, and also buyers find the right home to buy and negotiate the right terms.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my bounty with someone who will make their world better.
lenders.occupational_info: As a teacher, I give kids skill sets for lifelong learning. As a musician, I take people on a temporary "down-island" vacation.

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: Natural Science Educator
